data.name: Rope Cow - Rope it to The Cow
data.detailed_description:
Rope Cow. A cow with a dream. And a with rope. A cow who thought he was free. But he's just a cow and lives in a deception set by the farm and corporation that exploits them, milk and body.

Rope swing through multiple challenges in the admitedly short and difficult story mode, and master the two freestyle levels.

FEATURES


  • Single player story mode
  • Goal stages game mode with two stages
  • Unique custom rope physics with moving objects
  • Glorious satisfaction when pulling out incredible moves
  • Tons+ of cows

COW WITH ROPE


Rope Cow is a handcrafted game made by a single dev with <3, for all the swinging rope and grappling-hook fans out there.

Along the way, you'll help unfold a story that unveils the overwhelming illusion our protagonist cow has been living in. But this realization brings a more profound dilemma: are we cow, or are we swinger?

Stay safe. Be a happy cow.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 and up (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel 64bit 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
